alert.note: Alert for Becker; Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:26AM CDT until July 15 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CLAY...NORTHWESTERN OTTER TAIL AND SOUTHWESTERN BECKER COUNTIES... At 226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cormorant, or 10 miles west of Detroit Lakes, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Pelican Rapids, Lake Lida, Vergas, Shoreham, Dunvilla, Cormorant and Lake Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
